english_example_sentence: We always sell our old furniture at a reasonable price.
russian_example_sentence: Мы всегда продаем нашу старую мебель по разумной цене.
turkish_example_sentence: Biz her zaman eski mobilyalarımızı uygun fiyata satarız.
